root.name: Sega GT
root.description: Sega GT was the flagship racing sim for the Sega Dreamcast. Containing over 130 cars and 22 tracks as well as a variety of racing modes to choose from. Sega GT also allowed users to create their own cars from scratch with over 2 million possible combinations. Sega GT had a VMU mini-game that you could play to earn money for use in single player mode. There was also online connectivity for lap time leaderboards.Â
